title: Producer Ervin "EP" Pope talks Kanye West, Scarface and more!
itunes:title: Producer Ervin "EP" Pope talks Kanye West, Scarface and more!
description:
Producer Ervin "EP" Pope sit's in to have a conversation about his entry into music production, his work with Kanye West's "College Dropout", Executive producing Scarface's last album "Deeply Rooted" and talking the rapper out of retiring, his work with "The Game" and what he looks for in a artist.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Producer Ervin "EP" Pope sit's in to have a conversation about his entry into music production, his work with Kanye West's "College Dropout", Executive producing Scarface's last album "Deeply Rooted" and talking the rapper out of retiring, his work with "The Game" and what he looks for in a artist.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
